overview.title: Overview
overview.description:
Nexdecade excels in designing complex PCB boards including analog, RF, high-speed digital, mixed signal, and high power variants, ensuring high success rates on initial attempts. With over two decades of experience and robust partnerships, our hardware design capabilities and lab facilities support comprehensive spec-to-product engineering services.
We meticulously analyze all PCB designs for timing, signal integrity, power management, and heat dissipation to guarantee optimal performance. Our services encompass board design from specifications through prototype development, board bring-up, and seamless integration into final products. We specialize in FPGA board designs for performance evaluation, offer redesigns to replace obsolete components, and provide firmware development including diagnostics, boot code, BSPs, and device drivers for diverse interfaces, aiming for enhanced functionality and efficiency.

services.description: Deliver media content directly to viewers over the internet without traditional cable or satellite TV. Nexdecade's OTT solutions provide a flexible platform for streaming services, ensuring a high-quality viewing experience across multiple devices.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description:
Over the past five years, Over-the-Top (OTT) video services have garnered significant attention as a novel platform, particularly in the United States. Recently, Bangladesh has embraced this trend over the last year and a half, with Nexdecade pioneering the development of its own hardware and software for OTT services. Currently, we oversee operations for Bengal Screen and Toffee.
The expansion of OTT services owes much to advancements in broadband infrastructure and the strategic distribution efforts of content providers, including Pay TV operators. These strategies have extended OTT platforms beyond traditional television to mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets. Pay TV providers are actively broadening their OTT offerings to enrich subscriber experiences with abundant content, ensuring seamless access to Video-on-Demand (VOD) and live TV across multiple devices. To stay ahead in this dynamic market and meet evolving subscriber demands, we have secured cutting-edge OTT platforms, particularly in Android TV, enhancing VOD capabilities across secondary devices.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Television broadcasting has undergone substantial transformation in recent years, becoming more diverse and digital-centric. One prominent shift is the increasing digitization of television networks, particularly evident in cable systems. This trend is driven by the advantages of value-added services such as customizable channel packs, interactive content, high-definition channels, and on-demand video offerings. Furthermore, government mandates requiring the installation of set-top boxes (STBs) in countries like China and India have contributed significantly to the rapid expansion of the global STB market. Amidst these developments, a select group of top manufacturers dominate the industry, shaping its evolution.
